Methods in org.apache.sling.api.scripting that return SlingHttpServletResponse

 SlingHttpServletResponse SlingBindings.getResponse()
          Returns the SlingBindings.RESPONSE property if not null and a SlingHttpServletResponse instance.

Uses of SlingHttpServletResponse in org.apache.sling.api.wrappers
 

Classes in org.apache.sling.api.wrappers that implement SlingHttpServletResponse
 class SlingHttpServletResponseWrapper
          The SlingHttpServletResponseWrapper class is a default wrapper class around a SlingHttpServletResponse which may be extended to amend the functionality of the original response object.
 

Methods in org.apache.sling.api.wrappers that return SlingHttpServletResponse
 SlingHttpServletResponse SlingHttpServletResponseWrapper.getSlingResponse()
          Return the original SlingHttpServletResponse object wrapped by this.
